timeline.message:
(CDAP-16673) Added TMS payload compression supported

- Compression is on by default

timeline.bodyText: If this is enabled by default, would it affect latency to publish message using ClientMessagingService?
timeline.author: CuriousVini

replies.bodyText: As per any compression, it is a trade off between network bandwidth and cpu. Generally compression over network is a more desirable trade off and can usually reduce latency since much less bytes are needed to be transmitted over the network
replies.author: chtyim
